headline: Ask HN: CS topics for teaching non-technical non-English speaking souls?
description:
The aim is not to make them masters in CS, but to give them enough knowledge in layperson's terms so that they are confident about computers and don't think it as magic.

For example, what happens when a user presses a key, how are simple characters displayed on screen, how are colours represented in a computer, how are images displayed, how is a string searched in a text file, how are entries in a spreadsheet column sorted, how computer does binary maths etc.

What topics do you recommend that will be more beneficial to a layperson?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 教导非技术性的非英语国家的灵魂的CS课题？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 教導非技術性的非英語國家的靈魂的CS課題？
description_zh-Hans: 例如，当用户按下一个键时会发生什么，如何在屏幕上显示简单的字符，计算机中如何表示颜色，如何显示图像，如何在文本文件中搜索字符串，如何对电子表格中的条目进行排序，计算机如何进行二进制数学运算等等，您建议哪些主题对普通人更有益？
description_zh-Hant: 例如，當用戶按下一個鍵時會發生什麼，如何在屏幕上顯示簡單的字符，計算機中如何表示顏色，如何顯示圖像，如何在文本文件中搜索字符串，如何對電子表格中的條目進行排序，計算機如何進行二進制數學運算等等，您建議哪些主題對普通人更有益？
